code: import React from"react";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import{faCheckCircle,faExclamationCircle,faInfoCircle}from"@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Notification=_ref=>{let{notification}=_ref;let icon,bgColor;if(notification.type==="success"){icon=faCheckCircle;bgColor="bg-green-500";}else if(notification.type==="error"){icon=faExclamationCircle;bgColor="bg-red-500";}else{icon=faInfoCircle;bgColor="bg-blue-500";}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`fixed bottom-4 right-4 px-6 py-3 rounded-lg shadow-lg z-50 ${bgColor} text-white flex items-center`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:icon,className:"mr-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:notification.message})]});};export default Notification;
